MIME::Types for Ruby

mime-types.rubyforge.org/

rdoc

mime-types.rubyforge.org/

Description

This library allows for the identification of a file’s likely MIME content type. This is release 1.19 with new MIME types. The identification of MIME content type is based on a file’s filename extensions.

MIME::Types for Ruby was originally based on and synchronized with MIME::Types for Perl by Mark Overmeer, copyright 2001 - 2009. As of version 1.15, the data format for the MIME::Type list has changed and the synchronization will no longer happen.
